24 RobotsTfPublisher::RobotsTfPublisher(SceneManager *scMgr, ros::NodeHandle *nh):

35 bool RobotsTfPublisher::publishTf(const std::vector<std::string> &names,const ros::Time &date)
36 {
37  Scene *sc = _scMgr->project()->getActiveScene();
38  foreach(string n,names){
39  Robot *r=sc->getRobotByName(n);
40  if(r){
41  this->publishTf(r,date);
42  }
43 
44  }
45 
46 }
47 
48 bool RobotsTfPublisher::publishTf(Robot *r, const ros::Time &date)
49 {
50  if(!r) return false;
51 
52  tf::Transform t;
53  int count(0);
54  for(uint i=0;i<r->getNumberOfJoints();++i){
55  Joint *jnt=r->getJoint(i);
56  Eigen::Affine3d pos=jnt->getMatrixPos();
57  t.setFromOpenGLMatrix(pos.data());
58  count += r->getRobotStruct()->joints[i]->n_link_jnt+r->getRobotStruct()->joints[i]->n_link_jnt_owned;
59  string body_name(r->getRobotStruct()->joints[i+1]->o->name);
60  body_name[body_name.find_first_of(".")]='/';
61  //_tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(t,date,"move3d_origin",r->getName()+"/"+jnt->getName()));
62  _tf_br->sendTransform(tf::StampedTransform(t,date,"move3d_origin",body_name));
63  }
64 }

move3d::SceneManager
The SceneManager class provide interface between ROS and the move3d scene and project. Use it to start libmove3d and place the robots and objects in the environment.
